alert.note: Alert for Northern Salinas Valley, Hollister Valley and Carmel Valley; Santa Lucia Mountains and Los Padres National Forest; Southern Salinas Valley, Arroyo Seco and Lake San Antonio (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 17 at 1:58PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL SAN BENITO AND CENTRAL MONTEREY COUNTIES THROUGH 230 PM PST... At 158 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Greenfield, or 11 miles northeast of Arroyo Seco, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Soledad and Greenfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Salinas Valley, Hollister Valley and Carmel Valley; Santa Lucia Mountains and Los Padres National Forest; Southern Salinas Valley, Arroyo Seco and Lake San Antonio
